tier.desc:
Highest single-target damage in the game right now.

Unfortunately, Expert nerfs non-advantaged DPS by 80% (so type advantage is 10x of neutral damage), so it's hard for him to shine in endgame content where he isn't advantaged.

His DPS is a lot higher than most other characters since his ultimate adds even more extra damage to his attacks for 2 turns.

tier.desc:
Good AoE farmer. Skills are nothing special, but her stats are insane.

Due to her sheer HP/ATK/DEF it's possible to brute force push story stages with Ghislaine.

Rated at A-tier since technically optional and you can do all content without her.
